file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 34-41-01-04 - GPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the GPWS/Windshear computer or EGPWS/Windshear computer. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY GPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER - RE- ALL 34-41-01-000-801-A MOVAL GPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER - IN- ALL 34-41-01-400-801-A STALLATION EGPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER - RE- ALL 34-41-01-000-802-A MOVAL EGPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER - IN- ALL 34-41-01-400-802-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 34-41-01 Page 1 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-41-01-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. GPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the GPWS/Windshear Computer. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223KLW Cockpit internal panel D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the GPWS/WDSHEAR circuit breaker (Location tip: 115 V AC/GPWS/WDSHEAR) and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Open panel 223KLW ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the knurled nut (2) which attaches the GPWS/Windshear computer (1). (2) Pull the GPWS/Windshear computer (1) by its handle until it is disconnected from the connector (3) attached to the mounting rack. (3) Remove the GPWS/Windshear computer (1) from the mounting rack. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-41-01 Page 2 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL GPWS/Windshear Computer - Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 223 DET. A B 1. GPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER 2. KNURLED NUT 3. CONNECTOR DET. B 145AMM340154.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-41-01 Page 3 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-41-01-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. GPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the GPWS/Windshear computer. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 34-41-00-700-801-A/500 GPWS/WINDSHEAR - OPERATIONAL CHECK AMM TASK 34-41-00-700-803-A/500 EGPWS/WINDSHEAR - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223KLW Cockpit internal panel D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the GPWS/Windshear computer (1) on the mounting rack. (2) Push the GPWS/Windshear computer (1) by its handle until it is connected to the connector (3) attached to the mounting rack. (3) Tighten the knurled nut (2) which attaches the GPWS/Windshear computer (1) to the mounting rack. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 34-41-01 Page 4 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the GPWS/WDSHEAR circuit breaker (Location tip: 115 V AC/GPWS/WDSHEAR) and remove a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (2) Do the GPWS/Windshear Operational Check ( AMM TASK 34-41-00-700-801-A/500) or EGPWS/Windshear Operational Check ( AMM TASK 34-41-00-700-803-A/500) as applicable. (3) Close panel 223KLW ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 34-41-01 Page 5 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-41-01-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. EGPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the EGPWS/Windshear Computer. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223KLW Cockpit internal panel D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the GPWS/WDSHEAR circuit breaker (Location tip: 115 V AC/GPWS/WDSHEAR) and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) Open panel 223KLW ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Release the knurled nut (2) which attaches the EGPWS/Windshear computer (1). (2) Pull the EGPWS/Windshear computer (1) by its handle until it is disconnected from the connector (3) attached to the mounting rack. (3) Remove the EGPWS/Windshear computer (1) from the mounting rack. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 34-41-01 Page 6 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL EGPWS/Windshear Computer - Installation Figure 402 A ZONES 223 DET. A B 1. EGPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER 2. KNURLED NUT 3. CONNECTOR DET. B 145AMM340288.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 34-41-01 Page 7 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-41-01-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 5. EGPWS/WINDSHEAR COMPUTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the EGPWS/Windshear computer. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 34-41-00-470-801-A/400 TERRAIN DATA BASE - LOADING AMM TASK 34-41-00-700-803-A/500 EGPWS/WINDSHEAR - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223KLW Cockpit internal panel D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task In the cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Install the EGPWS/Windshear computer (1) on the mounting rack. (2) Push the EGPWS/Windshear computer (1) by its handle until it is connected to the connector (3) attached to the mounting rack. (3) Tighten the knurled nut (2) which attaches the EGPWS/Windshear computer (1) to the mounting rack. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 34-41-01 Page 8 of 9 Rev 51 - Oct 31/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the GPWS/WDSHEAR circuit breaker (Location tip: 115 V AC/GPWS/WDSHEAR) and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. (2) Do the load of the Terrain and Envelope Databases to the EGPWS/Windshear computer ( AMM TASK 34-41-00-470-801-A/400). (3) Do the EGPWS/Windshear Operational Check ( AMM TASK 34-41-00-700-803-A/500). (4) Close panel 223KLW ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 34-41-01 Page 9 of 9 Rev 51 - Oct 31/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
